summary: team-mates neymar and dani alves proved their dedication to barcelona by supporting the club 's basketball side . neymar and alves headed to watch el clasico on thursday night alongside the brazilian 's sister rafaella . barca prevailed with a narrow 85-80 victory in the euro league contest .

One of the core ideas of the aspect of Barcelona's pursuit of a treble of trophies is the importance and significance of winning multiple championships in a single season. A treble involves winning the domestic league championship, domestic cup, and a continental championship - all in the same year. It is an extremely difficult feat to achieve, but it is considered one of the greatest accomplishments in football. Barcelona is currently competing in three different competitions - the La Liga, the Copa del Rey, and the UEFA Champions League - trying to become the first Spanish team to win the treble twice. It shows the level of dedication and determination that the team and its members have to be successful in the sport.
